scripts.build:free-dist: npm run eslint && cross-env BUILDTARGET=basic rollup -c && javascript-obfuscator dist/botium-box-server.js --output dist/botium-box-server.js --compact true --self-defending true
scripts.build:premium-dist: npm run eslint && cross-env BUILDTARGET=premium rollup -c && javascript-obfuscator dist/botium-box-server.js --output dist/botium-box-server.js --compact true --self-defending true
scripts.docker:build:premium: npm run build:premium-dist && npm run postbuild:premium-dist && cd ../.. && docker image build -t ${npm_package_config_imageBase}-premium/${npm_package_config_image}:$npm_package_version -f web/server/Dockerfile . --build-arg edition=premium
scripts.docker:build:free: npm run build:free-dist && npm run postbuild:free-dist && cd ../.. && docker image build -t ${npm_package_config_imageBase}-free/${npm_package_config_image}:$npm_package_version -f web/server/Dockerfile . --build-arg edition=basic
scripts.publish:free-dist: npm run build:free-dist && mkdir -p ~/botium-box-basic-dist/server/dist/generated && cp -Rf dist database package.json .graphqlconfig.yml ~/botium-box-basic-dist/server && cp src/generated/prisma.graphql ~/botium-box-basic-dist/server/dist/generated && cp src/schema.graphql ~/botium-box-basic-dist/server/dist && cp .env.botium-box-basic-dist ~/botium-box-basic-dist/server/.env
scripts.publish:premium-dist: npm run build:premium-dist && mkdir -p ~/botium-box-dist/premium/server/dist/generated && cp -Rf dist database package.json .graphqlconfig.yml ~/botium-box-dist/premium/server && cp src/generated/prisma.graphql ~/botium-box-dist/premium/server/dist/generated && cp src/schema.graphql ~/botium-box-dist/premium/server/dist && cp .env.botium-box-premium-dist ~/botium-box-dist/premium/server/.env
